GSD.description:
f2fs: fix to do sanity check on block address in f2fs_do_zero_range()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit a34d7b49894b0533222188a52e2958750f830efd. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: f2fs: fix to do sanity check on block address in f2fs_do_zero_range()
